Uses of Class
org.tribuo.common.xgboost.XGBoostTrainer.DMatrixTuple

Packages that use XGBoostTrainer.DMatrixTuple
Package
Description
org.tribuo.common.xgboost
Provides abstract classes for interfacing with XGBoost abstracting away all the Output dependent parts.
